post.summary: Check if the user is manager or Update/create a user by userId with a new role

delete.summary: Perform delete operation of an onboarding request
delete.description: Perform delete operation of an onboarding request receiving onboarding id, then invokes async process to set DELETED as status for institution and user onboardings.

put.summary: Complete onboarding by verifying and uploading contract, then trigger async activities.
put.description: Perform complete operation of an onboarding request receiving onboarding id and contract signed by the institution.It checks the contract's signature and upload the contract on an azure storageAt the end, function triggers async activities related to complete onboarding that consist of create the institution, activate the onboarding and sending data to notification queue.

put.summary: Complete onboarding without verifying contract signature.
put.description: Perform complete operation of an onboarding request as /complete but without signature verification of the contract

get.summary: Check if contract signed is a CADES file
get.description: Check if contract signed is a CADES file even if is not .p7m

put.summary: Find an attachment for a given onboarding id and update the contract signed path
put.description: Find  an attachment for a given onboarding id and update the contract signed path
Service to add a members to a specific UserGroup entity by its institutionId, parentInstitutionId and productId

delete.description: Service to delete members from a specific UserGroup entity by its institutionId, parentInstitutionId and productId

Problem.title: Problem

detail.description: Human-readable description of this specific problem.

instance.description: A URI that describes where the problem occurred.

invalidParams.description: A list of invalid parameters details.

title.description: Short human-readable summary of the problem.

type.description: A URL to a page with more details regarding the problem.

Problem.description: A "problem detail" as a way to carry machine-readable details of errors (https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7807)

role.description: Available values: MANAGER, DELEGATE, SUB_DELEGATE, OPERATOR, ADMIN_EA

lastActiveOnboardingUserEmail.description: User's last active onboarding used email

isAggregator.description: True if institution is an aggregator

recipientCode.description: Billing recipient code, not required only for institutionType SA

contractType.description: PSP Contract type A or B

onboardingDate.description: Institution's old onboarding date in the format 2007-12-03T10:15:30+01:00 (YYYY-MM-DD-T-HH:mm:ss+UTC)

activatedAt.description: Previous contract sign date for import

institutionId.description: The institution ID where users will be added. This takes precedence over the tax code

institutionSubunitCode.description: Add users to the institution via subunit code. Can be used in combination with institutionTaxCode

institutionTaxCode.description: Add users to the institution via tax code. Can be used in combination with institutionSubunitCode

sendCreateUserNotificationEmail.description: Send an email notification to the user. By default it's set to true

toAddOnAggregates.description: Enable automatic management of group assignment

email.description: The email address of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

env.description: Environment. The field is currently not used to create users. It's only returned in response

id.description: User ID of a user already in the registry. A role will be added to the institution/product for the user. It takes precedence over taxCode

name.description: The name of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

productRole.description: The product role to assign to the user based on the product specifications

role.description: The role to assign to the user

roleLabel.description: The product role label based on the product specifications. The field is currently not used to create users

surname.description: The surname of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

taxCode.description: The tax code of the user to add / create. If id is present, the field is ignored

userMailUuid.description: The email ID of the user already in the registry to be assigned to the institution/product. This field is only used when adding a user by ID

onboardedInstitutions.description: Object that includes all info about onboarded institutions linked to a user

user.description: Object that includes all info about a user

userEmail.description: User's email linked to the institution

members.description: List of all the members of the group
List of all the members of the group
